item.title: Democrats look primed to win the House but a wave may be harder
item.description: Gerrymandering and longer-term trends in polarization have left fewer competitive House seats in next year’s midterm elections.

item.title: Trump revives an old vision of American power, with global implications
item.description: Trump’s moves to assert U.S. dominance in the Western Hemisphere and pull back from Europe could embolden Russia and China.

item.title: We texted 1,000 Americans about U.S. actions in Venezuela. Here’s what they said.
item.description: A Washington Post poll shows Americans are split on sending military forces to Venezuela to capture Maduro. Most say it should have required Congress’...

item.title: Trump amplifies conspiracy theories on killing of Minnesota lawmaker
item.description: Trump shared a video baselessly linking Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz to brazen political killings in the state this summer.

item.title: What Maduro’s ouster means for Trump’s mass deportation campaign
item.description: Trump said many Venezuelan immigrants “want to go back.” Will Maduro’s removal spark a return — or another exodus?
